message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30.  It's better to secure something now before inflation eats away at the value.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice. Let's be fair - I take $60, you take $40. Remember, the value decreases with each round, so it's in your best interest to accept.
Bob, my friend, time is running out!  Let's split the difference from your last offer.  I get $60, you get $40.  Don't let inflation shrink our pot any further!
